items.sentence: The owner of this apartment building lives on the third floor.
The police promised Tom that they would look for his daughter.
The world needs to develop new energy sources in place of oil.
Tom and John went to the bar last night to pick up some girls.
My grandparents have smallpox vaccination scars on their arms.
Tom can\'t understand why Mary won\'t agree to help him study.
Tom didn\'t go to school yesterday because he didn\'t want to.
Tom doesn\'t like people who don\'t take their jobs seriously.
Even though he was a child, he worked hard to help his mother.
How would you like to come and spend a week with us next year?
I came to Japan four years ago intending to stay for one year.
I think Tom is probably better at French than you think he is.
I\'m getting older and I don\'t want to work at night anymore.
Tom said he saw something suspicious on the morning Mary died.
Tom said that he thought the economy was likely to get better.
Tom didn\'t get paid as much as they told him they\'d pay him.
You shouldn\'t hate people. You should only hate what they do.
Tom volunteered to do all the things no one else wanted to do.
Tom can already play the drums better than I could at his age.
Tom and Mary spent the evening talking about John\'s problems.
